title: Mean and median based on shape of distribution

content.question: For which of the following distributions is the mean greater than the median?

choices.label: Choice A has 0 at the left of the horizontal axis and a vertical axis drawn at that point. The curve plotted starts on the vertical axis above the horizontal axis and is decreasing and concave up until reaching the horizontal axis on the right.

Choice B has 0 at the left of the horizontal axis and a vertical axis drawn at that point. The curve plotted starts on the vertical axis above the horizontal axis and is decreasing and concave up until reaching the horizontal axis in the middle of the axis. The curve then becomes increasing and concave up until reaching a vertical line on the right side of the horizontal axis. The curve is left-right symmetric.

Choice C has 0 at the left of the horizontal axis and a vertical axis drawn at that point. The curve plotted starts on the vertical axis above the horizontal axis and is a horizontal line until the middle of the horizontal axis, where it becomes a vertical line down to the horizontal axis.

Choice D has 0 in the middle of the horizontal axis and no vertical axis. The curve plotted starts at the horizontal axis on the left and is increasing and concave up, then switches to increasing and concave down before reaching a maximum at 0 and becoming decreasing and concave down, then decreasing and concave up before reaching the horizontal axis. The curve is left-right symmetric around 0.

Choice E has 0 toward the right of the horizontal axis and no vertical axis. The curve plotted starts at the horizontal axis on the left and is increasing and concave up, then switches to increasing and concave down before reaching a maximum at 0 and becoming decreasing and concave down, then decreasing and concave up before reaching the horizontal axis. The curve has a long tail on its left side.

content.answer: Choice A has 0 at the left of the horizontal axis and a vertical axis drawn at that point. The curve plotted starts on the vertical axis above the horizontal axis and is decreasing and concave up until reaching the horizontal axis on the right.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
